doc.title: Operation: Married by Christmas
doc.plot: When Haley Bell Thornton arrived back in Mule Hollow wearing a wedding gown, no one bothered to ask where the groom was. Especially not Will Sutton, the first of her ditched fianc√©es. So Haley's back, hiding out at her granddaddy's ranch. But unbeknownst to both Haley and Will, her granddad - and the matchmaking ladies of the small town - have banded together with a secret holiday plan, to make those old wedding bells finally chime by Christmas!
